column5: Dose anyone know where I can get these soft 7" worms? I've had them maybe 2 yrs., but have produced great and I don't see them at any potential fishing shelves ie: Can.Tire, Bass Pro, WalMart etc. here's a few pics. I can't find a name on the old packaging surprisingly.    Any idea?? Thanks.  Pidge.
My search resulted in berkley sqwormers introduced in 1999 but were considered "too soft" by many and are now discontinued.....but I really have no idea.
Found this page, http://www.kentuckyhunting.net/forums/showthread.php?28957-berkley-sqwormers-10-in  with this info:
I use to buy them years ago. I always had loads of motor oil green. Those were great worms.
Ebay has a few other types, you could set up email alert so when ever someone post Swormers you are notified....you never know when a pack may pop up lol

Geeze 1999? Have I had these that long? Lololol. Interesting website for the discontinued stuff, never seen it before. Can't seem to find them there, but a boy can dream..Ill keep an eye on eBay and see what happens. Thanks guys.  Pidge.
